articles.author: Al Jazeera
articles.title: West African leaders make plan for military intervention in Niger - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: Regional bloc ECOWAS works out potential operation to back up ultimatum to coup leaders to give up power by Sunday.
articles.content:
West African defence chiefs have made a plan for potential military intervention to reverse last weeks coup in Niger, including how and when to deploy forces.
The Economic Community of West African … [+3563 chars]
